member.name: P:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Validation.Integration.WPF.Properties.Resources.ExceptionCannotModifyDynamicRule
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to This ValidatorRule cannot be updated..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Validation.Integration.WPF.Properties.Resources.ExceptionComplexBindingPath
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The binding with the complex path '{0}' cannot be validated. Only single-property binding paths are supported..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Validation.Integration.WPF.Properties.Resources.ExceptionDependencyPropertyHasNoBinding
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The dependency property with name '{0}' for element '{1}' (Name='{2}', HashCode={3}) does not have a binding to validate..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Validation.Integration.WPF.Properties.Resources.ExceptionMissingDependencyProperty
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The element '{1}' (Name='{2}', HashCode={3}) does not have a dependency property with name '{0}'..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Validation.Integration.WPF.Properties.Resources.ExceptionSourcePropertyNameNotSet
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The source property name for the ValidatorRule is not set..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The source type '{0}' does not have a property '{1}' for the ValidatorRule..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Validation.Integration.WPF.Properties.Resources.ExceptionSourceTypeNotSet
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The source type for the ValidatorRule is not set..

member.name: T:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Validation.Integration.WPF.ValidatorRule
member.summary: Validation rule that performs validation of a converted value using the validators associated to the source property of a binding.
member.remarks:
A can be initialized with a from which it can get the source item and the source property to extract the appropriate validators.
This rule is intended to be used on the step, after the raw value has been converted but before it is applied to the source of the binding.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Validation.Integration.WPF.ValidatorRule.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class..

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Validation.Integration.WPF.ValidatorRule.#ctor(System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class for a binding expression.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Validation.Integration.WPF.ValidatorRule.Validate(System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Validates using the validators associated with the source property.
member.param: The value from the binding target to check.
The culture to use in this rule.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Validation.Integration.WPF.ValidatorRule.SourceType
member.summary: Gets or sets the type from which explicitly configured instances should get their validators.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Validation.Integration.WPF.ValidatorRule.SourcePropertyName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the property for which explicitly configured instances should get their validators.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Validation.Integration.WPF.ValidatorRule.ValidationSpecificationSource
member.summary: Gets or sets the source for validation information.

member.summary: Gets or sets the ruleset name to use when validating.
